metadata.synopsis: After her family moves from Russia to Israel, 13-year-old Clara (Lucy Dubnichek) finds herself in the unenviable position of being the new girl at Golda Meir Junior High School. Thanks to her psychic powers, however, she quickly becomes a popular friend to have. Why study when Clara knows what's going to be on the test beforehand? But when Clara starts a tentative romance with classmate Tikel (Halil Elohev), she begins to realize that love is the greatest power of all.
metadata.genre: Art House & International/Comedy/Drama/Kids & Family/Science Fiction & Fantasy
